mapper.select: SELECT DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, DEPARTMENTS.LEVEL AS level FROM DEPARTMENTS
SELECT DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, DEPARTMENTS.LEVEL AS level FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId}
SELECT DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, DEPARTMENTS.LEVEL AS level FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE #{departmentName}
SELECT DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, DEPARTMENTS.LEVEL AS level FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE DEPARTMENTS.LEVEL = #{level}
